question: My mother is taking just carboplatin yesterday was her first session.  I was wondering if one drug was enough originally the doctor wanted to give her Gemzar and Carbo together but the insurance did not accept Gemzar the doctor is trying to get it but if not maybe taxol but do to her nerve damage because of diabetes they dont want to use the taxol.  She has endometrial cancer that has not spread to her lungs she never did the chemo the first time after her hysterectomy and here we are today....
